alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 03 at 1:00PM MST until March 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations. Niobrara, North Sioux and Dawes Counties including the Pine Ridge. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions possible due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
